Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I check the OS version of an Android device?  How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?How can one know which android version is installed on the phone?How can i remove the 20+ apps which installed on the phone? The remove button is disabled.
Title: just got a galaxy few hours ago and have two questions

history.Text: A. How can one lnow which android version is installed on the phone.B. How can i remove the 20+ apps which installed on the phone. The remove button is disabled.
just got a galaxy few hours ago and have two questions
1. How can one know which android version is installed on the phone?2. How can i remove the 20+ apps which installed on the phone? The remove button is disabled.

How can one know which android version is installed on the phone?2. How can i remove the 20+ apps which installed on the phone? The remove button is disabled.
